name: Flight Delay Assurance
description: Get compensated for flight delays over 3 hours.

name: Trip Cancellation Cover
description: Full refund for cancellations due to medical emergencies.

name: Luggage Protection Plan
description: Protect against lost or delayed luggage.

name: Missed Connection Insurance
description: Compensation for missed connections due to airline fault.

name: Overbooking Compensation
description: Receive payment if you're denied boarding due to overbooking.

name: Emergency Medical Cover
description: Emergency medical expenses covered during your travel.

name: Travel Abandonment Insurance
description: Reimbursement if you abandon your trip after a 12-hour delay.

name: Natural Disaster Evacuation Plan
description: Covers evacuation costs due to natural disasters.

name: Comprehensive Travel Insurance
description: All-inclusive coverage for a worry-free travel experience.
